snippet.title: Designed for Danger Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Designed for Danger is a fan made Portal 2 campaign. Go to http://www.designedfordanger.com for information and download links.

The trailer music is courtesy of Valve Corporation. The song featured is "The Courtesy Call". It, and other songs from the game, can be downloaded from http://www.thinkwithportals.com/music.php.
